issue.description: All the ramps have been blocked off by trees

ai_recommendation.title: Immediate Accessibility Improvement Plan for Fresno - Tree Blockages on Ramps
ai_recommendation.description: An urgent, targeted plan to remove tree-related blockages affecting ramp accessibility for visual_impairment, cognitive_disabilities in Fresno, ensuring immediate safety and usability.
recommended_actions: Engage with local disability advocacy groups and affected community members for immediate concerns
Perform rapid cost-benefit analysis and secure emergency funding if needed
Develop short-term intervention strategy focusing on tree trimming/removal
Coordinate with city planning, public works, and disability services departments for expedited action
Implement temporary ADA-compliant solutions where possible until permanent fixes are made
Establish immediate maintenance and monitoring protocols
Create community education campaign on the importance of unobstructed ramps
Establish feedback mechanisms for continuous improvement
ai_recommendation.expected_impact: Ensure immediate safety and usability of ramps for young_adults with visual_impairment, cognitive_disabilities, reducing risk of injury and enhancing daily mobility.
